BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
 
 
 OpenCV => master
 
 <denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
 
 Refer to the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/modules/viz/include/opencv2/viz/types.hpp#L307>code</denchmark-link>
 
 inline cv::viz::Color cv::viz::Color::brown()      { return Color(0,    75, 150); }
 The RGB color code for brown should be (165, 42, 42) instead of (150, 75, 0).

comments_0.comment_text:
Hello,

 Can I work on this issue?

comments_1.comment_text: Hi, This issue is already fixed: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/10782>#10782</denchmark-link>
